text:
Amber Heard’s Beau Elon Musk Is a Perfect Gentleman on Date Night

Chivalry is not dead! Elon Musk came to Amber Heard’s rescue on a romantic but chilly date night Down Under. The actress and CEO of Tesla Motors and SpaceX have been dating for…
